room_title: Escape room "The Midnighters" by Olde City Escape Games in Philadelphia
review: excellent games....we did the midnighters and then went back to the quest. Both games are great but Midnighters was my personal favorite. We were 8 people and everyone had a blast. We've done a few escape games and these were top notch.

room_title: Escape room "The Midnighters" by Olde City Escape Games in Philadelphia
review: We raced through both the Midnighters and The Quest for Freedom in one evening. It was a blast. They were very different, but both challenging. Some surprising and cool elements.

room_title: Escape room "The Midnighters" by Olde City Escape Games in Philadelphia
review: Our guide was great. And great experience going to this escape room on my birthday with family and friends. Not very difficult, not very easy either. The Midnighters was fairly at a normal level settings. Me and my group escaped with 12 minutes to spare. Highly recommend this room!
